description:
A hot day shouldn’t stop you from running, but it should change what you wear. Going from soaked to feeling dry in only 7 minutes, Brooks’ Atmosphere tee wicks away sweat so quickly you can almost forget the heat… almost.

  • DriLayer® Burst fabric wicks away sweat and dries quickly
  • Recycled polyester blend has just enough spandex for comfortable movement
  • Each top uses the equivalent of 10 plastic water bottles worth of recycled material
  • Anti odour control helps keep your tee fresher, longer
  • Hanger loop means no more tossing in a pile
  • UPF 50+ blocks more than 98% of harsh UV
name: Brooks Atmosphere Short Sleeve 2.0 - Men's
